abstract: The LaserShield $200 starter kit comes with a master alarm unit, a wireless detection unit and two keychain remotes.
snippet: The LaserShield $200 starter kit comes with a master alarm unit, a wireless detection unit and two keychain remotes.
lead_paragraph: Those who rent their homes are just as vulnerable to burglars as homeowners, but they are less likely to have burglar alarms. And who can blame them? What renter wants to pay to install a system that has to be left behind in a move, or be locked into a monitoring company’s contract that is longer than the lease?

headline.main: An Electronic Watchdog Will Follow You to a New Home
headline.print_headline: An Electronic Watchdog Will Follow You to a New Home
